page.title: 10UP HELLY AA 1985
page.content: {UP HELLY AA}IS THE SHETLAND{FIRE {FESTIVAL}WHICH TAKES PLACE ONCE A YEAR ON THE LAST TUESDAY IN JANUARY.ONE OF IT'S ORIGINS COULD HAVE BEEN TO WELCOME THE RETURN OF THE SUN AFTER A LONG DARK WINTER.THIS YEAR'S{UP HELLY {AA}TOOK PLACE ON JANUARY 29th WHEN 51 SQUADS TOOK PART WITH A TOTAL OF 954 GUISERS(A RECORD NUMBER)OF WHOM 866 WERE CARRYING TORCHES.IT WAS A WINDY DAMP NIGHT FOR{JARL JOHN RATTER}WHO REPRESENTED{THORVALD INFLYTTER}WITH HIS LONGSHIP{'LAKS'}AND 40 FELLOW VIKINGS.{THE JUNIOR JARL}WAS{IAIN {JOHNSTON}AND HIS LONGSHIP{'IKIGAIT'. SOME OF THE MOST COLOURFUL SQUADS WERE {HENHOUSE HO-DOWN , FRAGGLES , {GIZMO-GREMLINS , PINBALL WIZARDS , {TEDDY BEARS PICNIC AND FAIR {'H'ISLANDERS. }
